task.name: listhistory
task.shortdescription: List the processing history of a dataset:
task.description: List the processing history of a dataset: The list of all task processing steps will be given in the logger.
task.example:
The list of all task processing steps in a visibility data set are listed in the logger.
Keyword arguments: vis -- Name of input visibility file default: none; example: vis='ngc5921.ms' async -- Run asynchronously default = False; do not run asychronously
